altGlyph.description: Defines an alternative representation of a glyph in a font

altGlyphDef.description: Defines a set of glyph substitutions for an altGlyph element

altGlyphItem.description: Defines a substitution for a specific glyph in an altGlyphDef element

animate.description: Defines an animation on an SVG element

animateColor.description: Defines an animated color change for an SVG element

animateMotion.description: Defines an animated motion path for an SVG element

animateTransform.description: Defines an animated transformation on an SVG element

clipPath.description: Defines a clipping path for an SVG element

color-profile.description: Defines a color profile for an SVG document

cursor.description: Defines a cursor for an SVG element

defs.description: Defines a set of reusable SVG elements

desc.description: Defines a description of an SVG element

feBlend.description: Defines a blend mode for two input images in a filter

feColorMatrix.description: Applies a color transformation to an input image

feComponentTransfer.description: Allows for component-wise remapping of input image components

feComposite.description: Combines two input images using a composition operation

feConvolveMatrix.description: Applies a matrix convolution filter effect to an input image

feDiffuseLighting.description: Creates a lighting effect using the alpha channel as a bump map

feDisplacementMap.description: Displaces the pixels in an input image according to a displacement map image

feDistantLight.description: Defines a distant light source for use in a lighting filter effect

feFlood.description: Fills the filter subregion with a solid color

feFuncA.description: Defines the alpha transfer function for a component in a filter

feFuncB.description: Defines the transfer function for a component

feFuncG.description: Defines the transfer function for a component

feFuncR.description: Defines the transfer function for a component

feGaussianBlur.description: Applies a Gaussian blur to an input image

feImage.description: Inserts an external image into an SVG element

feMergeNode.description: Specifies an input image for use with a feMerge filter

feMorphology.description: Expands or contracts the shape of an input image

feOffset.description: Offsets the position of an input image

fePointLight.description: Defines a point light source for use in a lighting filter effect

feSpecularLighting.description: Creates a specular lighting effect using the alpha channel as a bump map

feSpotLight.description: Defines a spotlight source for use in a lighting filter effect

feTile.description: Repeats an input image to fill a filter subregion

feTurbulence.description: Generates a Perlin noise or turbulence pattern

foreignObject.description: Inserts a foreign object into an SVG document

g.description: Creates a group of SVG elements

glyph.description: Defines a single glyph in an SVG font

glyphRef.description: References a glyph in a font

hatchpath.description: Defines the path of a hatching pattern

image.description: Inserts an external raster image into an SVG document

linearGradient.description: Defines a linear gradient for an SVG element

marker.description: Defines a marker symbol to be used with a shape or line

mask.description: Defines a mask for an SVG element

metadata.description: The metadata element provides a container for storing non-visual data.

missing-glyph.description: The missing-glyph element provides a fallback for glyphs that are not available in a font.

mpath.description: The mpath element provides a way to animate the motion of an object along a path.

path.description: The path element defines a path to be drawn.

pattern.description: The pattern element defines a repeating pattern to be used as a fill or stroke.

polygon.description: The polygon element defines a closed shape consisting of a series of connected straight line segments.

polyline.description: The polyline element defines an open shape consisting of a series of connected straight line segments.

radialGradient.description: The radialGradient element defines a radial gradient to be used as a fill or stroke.

rect.description: The rect element defines a rectangle to be drawn.

script.description: The script element contains script statements.

set.description: The set element provides a way to animate an attribute to a given value.

stop.description: The stop element defines a color or gradient stop in a gradient.

style.description: The style element contains style information for a document or part of a document.

svg.description: The svg element is the root element of an SVG document.

switch.description: The switch element allows conditional processing of SVG elements.

symbol.description: The symbol element defines a reusable graphic element.

text.description: The text element defines a block of text to be drawn.

textPath.description: The textPath element provides a way to align text along a path.

title.description: The title element provides a title for a document or part of a document.

tref.description: The tref element provides a way to reference a portion of text in another element.

tspan.description: The tspan element provides a way to group a portion of text within a larger block of text.

use.description: The use element provides a way to reuse a single element and apply transformations to it.

view.description: The view element defines a rectangular portion of the SVG canvas that should be displayed.

vkern.description: Defines vertical kerning for a pair of glyphs in a font.
